task_description: Facing the building to your North-West (approx. 328°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To estimate the height of the building, I need to look up to see the top of the structure.
I need to adjust my position to get a better perspective of the building's height.
I need to look down to see the base of the building for a complete height estimation.
I need to move closer to the building to get a better view of its full height.
I need to look up again to see the top of the building for a complete height estimation.
I now have a clear view of the building from top to bottom and can estimate its height.
